amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for Operation Inherent Resolve in the absence of a law enacted by Congress before such date that specifically authorizes the use of military force against the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant after March 31, 2016.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for Operation Inherent Resolve in the absence of a law enacted by Congress before such date that specifically authorizes the use of military force against the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant after March 31, 2016.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 231 (Roll no. 346).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 231 (Roll no. 346).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Schiff.
